*div1 type="summary"* *p*Nathaniel Cox to Austin, April 21, 1825. Introducing [JamesJ Kerr, who is going to Texas with all his family, white and black.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p* *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="04-21-1825">21. April 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear sir The *person_mentioned*Bearer */person_mentioned*of this *person_mentioned*Mr Kerr*/person_mentioned* is from *location_mentioned*Missouri*/location_mentioned* and moving to your *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* with all his *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned*, both *person_mentioned*[White?] */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Black*/person_mentioned*—he has been here some time waiting a passage— As we have never Exactly understood the nature of your laws relative to Slavery I could not answer many of *person_mentioned*Mr Kerr*/person_mentioned*s inquiries on that head, but have assured him *person_mentioned*slaves*/person_mentioned* have been taken there and held— I hope will find no difficulty with his, as it would ruin an helpless *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned* should he loose them. *person_mentioned*Mr Kerr*/person_mentioned* has been only known to me a few weeks but I am fully convinced he is a worthy man, and I hope he will be found a Valuable *person_mentioned*Citizen */person_mentioned*of your infant *location_mentioned*Republic*/location_mentioned*- */p* *p**person_mentioned*Genl. Lafayette*/person_mentioned* has just left us. You will learn from *person_mentioned*Mr Kerr*/person_mentioned* with what enthusiast he was received among us—he has gone to *location_mentioned*St Louis*/location_mentioned* I have not heard from *person_mentioned*Mrs Hawkins*/person_mentioned* very lately— */p* *p**person_mentioned*Nath: Cox*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
